reviewText: My review for their 2 disc set of GUAPA pretty well explains this cd of ODVG as well. Good Spanish music which I generally use as background music when I am doing something. Have a listen, I think you'll like them.
When you send my product? As requested I can know what, I suggest you do, I hope to receive your comments, thanks.

Este dvd nos muestra los primeros videos de los primeros dos discos de La Oreja De Van Gogh en sus comienzos: Dile al Sol y El viaje de copperpot. Videos como: Cuentame al odo, primer single de la oreja, Pesadilla, Mariposa, Pop, La playa son parte de este dvd entre otros. Para los fans de la primera oreja este dvd es indispensable ya que, tiene extras de fotos, conciertos, etc. Cabe sealar que en estos discos la vocalista es la cantante Amaia Montero que cant con la Oreja hasta el 2007. Actualmente la vocalista es Leire Martnez. Si te gustaba la participacin de Amaia en la Oreja es un DVD que debes tener en tu coleccin.

Es un buen video para conocer la trayectoria de la banda.  Puedes ver a los integrantes desde que comenzaron. Tambien contiene mucha informacion sobre la biografia de los mismos. El audio esta en Dolby 5.1 y se escucha muy bien.
la oreja de van gogh an awesome hispan music group , in this dvd you can find most of greatest songs of  its entire career and if you haven't known them , just take a look , they are great!!

Although many of the videos on this DVD are also on LODVG's Web site's ("zona exclusiva"), they look and sound much better on the DVD.  Videos included are:  el 28, cuntame al odo, pesadilla, dile al sol, el libro, cudate, pars, la playa, pop, mariposa, mariposa (original version) and three songs (cuntame al odo, el 28, tic tac) from "concierto bsico 40 principales."  There are also many extras, including some behind-the-scenes video and a few clips from a live concert.  The "lbum personal" includes the song, "tantos cosas que contar."  There are a few minor technical flaws here and there, but not enough to significantly detract from an otherwise fine set of videos.  If you like the CDs "Dile al Sol" and "Viaje de Copperpot," you should enjoy this DVD.

There are some valuable interviews and even an original version of "Mariposa."
This is a great collection of La oreja de Van Gogh.

This a great compilation of La Oreja's singles since the first video, you can see the evolution of this hispanic band.
A great style directed for the young matures, between 25-35, easy-listening, Amaya's beautiful voice is allucinating.
The only videos missing are Soare and Porque te vas.
Enjoy !!
